attributes.action: Remove the coalition government and call a general election.
attributes.additional_details:
The people are unhappy with the coalition government, and all faith in both parties has been lost, by the majority of the Briitish public.
Because of the austerity measures, which the IMF have clearly stated don't work; people are suffering far more now, than they have in years.
We demand a general election, immediately, so the people can decide what party is best for them, going forwards.
